localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
blogPost.body: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
blogPost.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator
blogPost.author: Scott Lewis

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.description: 從現有的IconJars中打開、瀏覽和拖放圖標。添加、刪除或替換現有IconJars中的圖標。或者，直接在Illustrator中將畫板導出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安裝IconJar(但我們建議您這樣做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars

previous.title: Buy and hold is one of the dumbest investment strategies ever that also happens to have the highest probability of success for the vast majority of investors

localize.full_text: 买入并持有是史上最愚蠢的投资策略之一，也恰恰是绝大多数投资者成功概率最高的策略。
買入並持有是史上最愚蠢的投資策略之一，也恰恰是絕大多數投資者成功概率最高的策略。

next.excerpt: Infracost is an open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests. When you change your infrastructure code (Terraform), we post a comment in the pull request, telling you the impact to your cloud bill, e.g. “this will increase your bill by 25% next month”.
next.title: Infracost - Open source cloud cost estimator in pull requests

localize.description: Infracost是一个开源的云成本估算器，在拉取请求中。当你更改基础设施代码（Terraform）时，我们会在拉取请求中发布一条评论，告诉你对云计算账单的影响，例如 "这将使你下个月的账单增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉请求中的开源云成本估算器

localize.description: Infracost是一個開源的雲成本估算器，在拉取請求中。當你更改基礎設施代碼（Terraform）時，我們會在拉取請求中發佈一條評論，告訴你對雲計算賬單的影響，例如 "這將使你下個月的賬單增加25%"。
localize.tagline: 拉請求中的開源雲成本估算器
